title: Economic growth on AS AD model

content.question: How is long-run economic growth demonstrated in the aggregate demandâ€“aggregate supply model?

choices.label: A rightward shift in the short-run aggregate supply curve
A leftward shift in the long-run aggregate supply curve

content.answer: A rightward shift in the long-run aggregate supply curve
